Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Organization : Total IDC co., Ltd.
• Total IDC is a corporation that develops IT services in Korea and provides services to customers.
• Total IDC operates and manages its own storage data center. And based on this, we provide services to our customers.

Project : theskyzone.net
• We are providing our customers with a cloud storage service.
• Our customers are using the service for work, personal work, and backup purposes.
• Cloud storage service provides services through various channels based on web browsers, folder synchronization of Windows and Mac PCs, and iOS and Android apps.

Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: We have plans to store the material stored by users on theskyzone.net in Filecoin for the long term backup. We plan to use Filecoin to periodically back-up the entire data of theskyzone.net project(User-saved data and DB backup, etc.)
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
• The source of the dataset is the material stored by the user on theskyzone.net.
• Users mainly use theskyzone.net for video editing, design work, photography work, and publishing work, etc.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe
